snippet.title: Star Birds - Official Trailer - New Game by Toukana & Kurzgesagt
snippet.description:
Find out more on Steam 👉 https://star-birds.com/steam
Join the Newsletter for exclusive updates & news:
https://star-birds.com

About the game
Formerly codenamed “Project Mango”, Star Birds is the first PC game in the kurzgesagt universe. It has been designed and developed by Toukana Interactive (creators of Dorfromantik) in collaboration with kurzgesagt - in a nutshell, the science storytellers known from YouTube.

Star Birds, Toukana’s second title, will offer a fresh and accessible approach to a well-established genre: base building and automation!

In the game, players will join the Star Birds on their mission across the vastness of space and help them gather much-needed resources by mining asteroids. Over time, they will establish a thriving mining operation, take care of the growing birds' needs, and discover new technologies to advance their operation even further. 
And who knows? They might uncover some truly out of this world mysteries…

This official reveal Trailer offers an exclusive first look into the game’s mechanics, gameplay, and design. Inspired by kurzgesagt’s well-known art style, Toukana has created 3D graphics that combine both studios’ visual styles. In the gameplay scenes shown in the trailer, buildings are placed on asteroids, resources are mined and transported through hand-drawn connection pipes for further processing. This creates a bustling network of production facilities, with rockets transporting the products to other locations within the asteroid field. A montage reveals several developed asteroids, each varying in shape and color. 

Star Birds is set to launch into orbit/space (and into your Steam library) in 2025.
